net.adamcin.oakpal.api.SlingSimulator

    Package Description
    net.adamcin.oakpal.api

    net.adamcin.oakpal.core.sling  

    • Uses of SlingSimulator in net.adamcin.oakpal.api

      Methods in net.adamcin.oakpal.api with parameters of type SlingSimulator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void ProgressCheck.simulateSling(SlingSimulator slingSimulator, Set<String> runModes)
      Override this method to accept an SlingSimulator to request installation of JCR resources like FileVault packages and RepositoryInitializer factory configs, as if running within a Sling repository instance.

    • Uses of SlingSimulator in net.adamcin.oakpal.core.sling

      Subinterfaces of SlingSimulator in net.adamcin.oakpal.core.sling 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  SlingSimulatorBackend
      Interface defining internal-facing behavior for the SlingSimulator, primarily regarding the retrieval and processing of Sling JCR installable resources submitted by ProgressChecks.
